paragraphs: On Saturday, August 30, a memorial run "Honoring Warriors, Running for Heroes of Ukraine" took place in the Stromovka Park in Prague, dedicated to the Day of Remembrance of the Defenders of Ukraine who died in the struggle for independence, sovereignty, and territorial integrity of the country.
The event was organized by the Embassy of Ukraine in the Czech Republic and the public organizations Hlas Ukrajiny and Spilka.
Both Ukrainian and Czech residents of the capital took part in it.
Before the race, Ambassador Vasily Zvarich addressed the gathered crowd with a speech. Then everyone together paid tribute to the fallen heroes with a moment of silence.
Each participant had the name of one of the fallen defenders written on their chest, to whom they dedicated their race.
